channel.title: How to make you admin automatically in game
channel.description: hi i have a server that i want people to pay gp to get ads off like where you have to go to the thing on emote tab and it takes you to a small house with an npc in it saying "trade with me to configure your advert settings" so you trade with him and buy advert free item ( this is the part idk how to do) and it goes into your player file and changes your player rights to 9999 if you can help me... thanks if its bot possible i can just have players go turn it into the help center and i can manually change

item.title: How to make you admin automatically in game
item.dc:creator: @bchachula bchachula
item.description:
@bchachula wrote:

~~~~ I didn’t really understand you but ill try to awnser what you are saying~~~

Player rights are
0-normal player
1-Moderator
2- Admin
3-Owner
4-Hidden Admin
5-Hidden Owner
10-Hidden Hoster/Owner

If your wonder how to change prices of items

use Item.Cfg
Also if you wanna make a npc charge cash im thinking u have to no how to make a lottery and change into npc style!
(i think) i dont no!

BTW your question will be removed from staff for server advertisment

Your advertisment-
PROJECT LOBBIESCAPE! custom shops, custom minigames, godswords, dfs dfh and alot more! You can search lobbiescape in serv downloads, get it, and enjoy! And if you want to publish your server type ::publish, it will give you tips on making it nonleeched!link!!!~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
PROJECT link™ is
●&#967
Complete Fail!

Use a status page to advertise like google.com/moparisthebest.com/status, Codefasga.com or more
